channel.title: Blood rune
channel.description: i want to bring blood runes into my server. but if there is over 100k+ blood runes it doesnt crash the server, it only crashes them. buti was wondering if there was a fix to blood runes. and if there isnt, the real question here is why...? whats so differant between blood runes and chaos...
